name: Gravitron (adrenator)
description:
You are a long forgotten hero that has kept his identity hidden from the rest of the world.

However, the city needs your help to ward off the evil.

Although you exist in a modern world, technology is starting to fail, allowing evil figures to claim authority and take over the city.

Only those with advanced tech stand the chance help save the city.

Equipped with an attachable jet  that can flip your gravity, your mission is make it through the city’s obstacle courses.

The game has no sound for a completely meditative experience.
